## üéì Key Concepts

### Auto-Generation
- Timetables automatically created on app startup
- If timetables exist, generation skipped
- Distributes all available teachers
- Includes assigned class teachers

### Edit-Only Mode
- Users can only edit teacher and subject
- Cannot change day or time
- Prevents scheduling mistakes
- Database changes saved immediately

### Multi-Stream Teaching
- Teachers can teach different streams at same time
- Different subjects per stream
- Same time slot different lessons

### Database Backed
- All data persisted to PostgreSQL
- Unique constraints prevent conflicts
- Transactions ensure data integrity

---

4. **Refer to code comparison** - See exact changes
5. **Check verification** - Know what's tested
6. **Keep troubleshooting guide handy** - For quick help
